agents.name: DPDP Knowledge Agent
agents.description: Get insights from the Digital Personal Data Protection Act. Ask about user rights, data fiduciaries, and obligations.

agents.name: Parliamentary Knowledge Agent
agents.description: Access information on the Rules of Procedure and Conduct of Business in Lok Sabha.

agents.name: IT Act Knowledge Agent
agents.description: Get insights into the Information Technology (IT) Act, 2000, India's key legislation governing cyber law, digital transactions, data protection, and online regulations.

agents.name: NCSP Knowledge Agent
agents.description: Get insights into the National Cyber Security Policy (NCSP) 2013, India’s strategic framework for enhancing cyber resilience.

agents.name: Aadhar Act Knowledge Agent
agents.description: Get insights from the Aadhaar Act, 2016. Ask about authentication, UIDAI functions, data security, and individual rights.

agents.name: NSAI Knowledge Agent
agents.description: Discover insights from India’s National Strategy for Artificial Intelligence by NITI Aayog. Explore key focus areas like healthcare, agriculture, education, smart mobility, and AI for public infrastructure.
